title: How did the Native Americans record their history? - Quora
tags: History of the United States of America

response.answer_text: The huge majority of native Americans had no written language, but did keep certain records either by the use of wampum beads which represented certain deals or happenings at specific time lines, or by glyphs, which were drawings and figures etched into stone or other materials. Most “history” was handed down from generation to generation by oral lore.
